coralmilk_intro.speaker: Takara
coralmilk_intro.text: Mmm... the currents feel softer today.@ It's a good day for coral milk.@ Have you ever tasted it, human?

coralmilk_explain.speaker: Takara
coralmilk_explain.text: It's made from soft coral.@ I crush it gently with my arms until it releases a pale pink essence.@ Then I stir in warm currents until it turns smooth and silky.

coralmilk_make.speaker: Takara
coralmilk_make.text: Of course.@ I don't let anyone else touch it.@ The coral listens to me better when I hum to it.@ It releases more sweetness that way.

coralmilk_meaning.speaker: Takara
coralmilk_meaning.text: When I drink it, it coats my throat, calms the restless parts of me.@ It tastes like warmth, like... someone breathing nearby.@ Like comfort I can keep.

coralmilk_obsession.speaker: Takara
coralmilk_obsession.text: I think I love it because it reminds me of you.@ When I drink it, I imagine warmth that doesn't fade.@ I pretend I can taste sunlight, skin, laughter... all the things you bring here.

options.text: You imagine me while drinking it?

coralmilk_confession.speaker: Takara
coralmilk_confession.text: Mmm.@ I like to imagine you'd share it with me someday.@ You'd hold the shell cup, and I'd guide your hand so you don't spill a drop.@ It would leave a pink sheen on your lips... I'd remember that forever.

options.text: You really think about that a lot, huh?

coralmilk_end.speaker: Takara
coralmilk_end.text: Romantic?@ Maybe.@ Or maybe I just like the thought of you tasting something that only I could prepare.@ Something that settles inside you and never quite fades.

options.text: You'd make it just for me?
You talk about it like it's alive.

coralmilk_final.speaker: Takara
coralmilk_final.text: Maybe it is.@ Maybe it's my way of keeping a little piece of you close.@ If you ever taste it, you'll understandâ€”@ it's not just a drink.@ It's how I remember you when you're gone.
